page.title: 08POTTEN END-THE BAKERY.
page.content:
THE POTTEN END BAKERY USES 210 lbs OF FLOUR EVERY DAY. THE BAKER STARTS WORK AT 4.00 AM AND FINISHES AT 2.00 PM. THEY CAN MAKE A LOAF OF BREAD IN 1 HOUR THIRTY MINUTES. IT ALSO SELLS BISCUITS,CAKE AND OTHER PRODUCTS. THE KINDS OF BREAD THAT THEY SELL ARE WHITE,BROWN,GRANARY AND SLICED. THEY HAVE A FEW REGULAR CUSTOMERS AND HAVE THREE ROUNDS. THEY DELIVER TO POTTEN END,HEMEL HEMPSTEAD AND BERKHAMPSTEAD, BY VAN.
THEY MAKE BREAD BY BAKING DOUGH,WHICH IS FLOUR,EGGS AND MILK MIXED TOGETHER. THIS TAKES 10 - 15 MINUTES.
THE VARIOUS CAKES THEY SELL ARE JAM TARTS,FRESH CREAM,CUSTARD SLICE,CHOCOLATE AND MANY OTHERS. THE BAKERY IS ON THE MAIN ROAD IN POTTEN END AND IS A VERY NICE BUSINESS.
